attributes.action: Transfer from foreign prison to UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition for UK government to put in place permanent treaty for transfer of UK citizens, who are prisoners held outside uk to uk. Prisoners facing the death penalty for drug smuggling, and held in overseas prisons. Protection of human rights of alleged prisoners found guilty of drug smuggling overseas. UK does not have death penalty. UK historically should lead by example, in human rights fair treatment of guilty or alleged guilty persons held in overseas prisons. Permanent UK treaty for transfer of all UK citizens accused of drug smuggling overseas facng death penalty. Transfer from foreign prison to UK.
